module.name: Ring Groups
module.description: Creates a group of extensions that all ring together. Extensions can be rung all at once, or in various 'hunt' configurations. Additionally, external numbers are supported, and there is a call confirmation option where the callee has to confirm if they actually want to take the call before the caller is transferred.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.6* #1953 *2.11.0.5* update license file *2.11.0.4* Fixes minor bug in adding or editing new ring groups *2.11.0.3* Fixes Cant Park calls on ring group that have MoH set, might fix #6474 as well *2.11.0.2* #6477 *2.11.0.1* #6055 *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.6* typo in error message *2.10.0.5* #5832 *2.10.0.4* #5652 *2.10.0.3* #4834 again *2.10.0.2* #4834, #5263 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* #5283 Overhaul Call Recording *2.9.0.6* #5011 *2.9.0.5* spellings, locazliations *2.9.0.4* #4977 *2.9.0.3* #4334 *2.9.0.2* #4799 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4671, #4655
